title: Fern Gully: the last rainforest (Captioned)
viewing_guidelines: CAPTIONED: suitable for hearing impaired viewers
subject_group: Literature/Children's literature - Film and video adaptations
Climate, Environment, Natural Resources & Disasters/Rain forests
description: Dedicated to "our children and our children's children", the magical, mystical world of Fern Gully, the last rainforest takes us to a secret, special place filled with wonder and adventure where human beings exist only in fairy tales! Human hero Zak, shrunk to fairy size by Crysta, joins Batty Koda, an escapee from human lab and the denizens of the forest as they struggle to save the future of the forest from the evil enemy Hexxus. Voices include Tim Curry, Christian Slater and Robin Williams.
related_objects: Title; 303724; Fern Gully: the Last Rainforest; Active; 1992
